org.mini2Dx.core.geom

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle
      • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Rectangle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Parallelogram, Positionable, Shape
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Quad

    public class Rectangle
extends com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle
implements Parallelogram
    Implements a rotatable rectangle. Adds extra functionality to the default rectangle implementation in LibGDX
    Author:
    Thomas Cashman
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle()
        Default constructor. Creates a Rectangle at 0,0 with a width and height of 1
